trans-unit.source: The 29 optional as match the string, but this prevents the 29 mandatory as that follow from matching. Ruby must then backtrack repeatedly so as to satisfy as many of the optional matches as it can while still matching the mandatory 29. It is plain to us that none of the optional matches can succeed, but this fact unfortunately eludes Ruby.
trans-unit.target: 29个可选的a匹配字符串，但这防止了后面的29个必需的a匹配。然后，Ruby必须反复回溯，以便在仍然匹配强制性29的同时满足尽可能多的可选匹配。对我们来说，很明显，任何可选匹配都无法成功，但是不幸的是，这一事实使Ruby难以捉摸。

The CGI class dynamically mixes in parameter and cookie-parsing functionality, environmental variable access, and support for parsing multipart requests (including uploaded files) from the CGI::QueryExtension module.
trans-unit.target: 该 CGI 参数和cookie的解析功能，环境变量的访问，并支持动态类混合用于解析从多部分请求（包括上载的文件） CGI::QueryExtension 模块。

trans-unit.source: The CGI class provides methods for sending header and content output to the HTTP client, and mixes in methods for programmatic HTML generation from CGI::HtmlExtension and CGI::TagMaker modules. The precise version of HTML to use for HTML generation is specified at object creation time.
trans-unit.target: 的 CGI 类提供在从对程序性HTML生成方法，用于发送报头和内容输出到HTTP客户端的方法，和混合 CGI::HtmlExtension 和CGI :: TagMaker模块。在对象创建时指定用于HTML生成的HTML的精确版本。

trans-unit.source: The Comparable mixin is used by classes whose objects may be ordered. The class must define the <=> operator, which compares the receiver against another object, returning a value less than 0, returning 0, or returning a value greater than 0, depending on whether the receiver is less than, equal to, or greater than the other object. If the other object is not comparable then the <=> operator should return nil. Comparable uses <=> to implement the conventional comparison operators (<, <=, ==, >=, and >) and the method between?.
The Fiddle::CompositeHandler instance
trans-unit.target: 该 Fiddle::CompositeHandler 实例

trans-unit.source: The DBM class provides a wrapper to a Unix-style dbm or Database Manager library.
trans-unit.target: 该 DBM 类提供了一个包装，以Unix风格DBM或数据库管理器库。

trans-unit.source: The DRbProtocol module asks each registered protocol in turn to try to open a server at the URI. Each protocol signals that it does not handle that URI by raising a DRbBadScheme error. If no protocol recognises the URI, then a DRbBadURI error is raised. If a protocol accepts the URI, but an error occurs in opening it, the underlying error is passed on to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DRbProtocol 模块询问每个注册协议依次尝试打开在服务器 URI 。每个协议都会通过引发 DRbBadScheme 错误来表明它不处理该 URI 。如果没有协议识别 URI ，则会引发 DRbBadURI 错误。如果协议接受 URI ，但是在打开它时发生错误，则底层错误会传递给调用方。

trans-unit.source: The DRbProtocol module asks each registered protocol in turn to try to open the URI. Each protocol signals that it does not handle that URI by raising a DRbBadScheme error. If no protocol recognises the URI, then a DRbBadURI error is raised. If a protocol accepts the URI, but an error occurs in opening it, a DRbConnError is raised.
trans-unit.target: 该 DRbProtocol 模块要求每个注册的协议依次尝试打开 URI 。每个协议都会通过引发 DRbBadScheme 错误来表明它不处理该 URI 。如果没有协议识别 URI ，则会引发 DRbBadURI 错误。如果协议接受 URI ，但是在打开它时发生错误，则会引发 DRbConnError 。

trans-unit.source: The DRbProtocol module asks each registered protocol in turn to try to parse the URI. Each protocol signals that it does not handle that URI by raising a DRbBadScheme error. If no protocol recognises the URI, then a DRbBadURI error is raised.
trans-unit.target: 所述 DRbProtocol 模块询问每个注册协议依次尝试解析该 URI 。每个协议都会通过引发 DRbBadScheme 错误来表明它不处理该 URI 。如果没有协议识别 URI ，则会引发 DRbBadURI 错误。

trans-unit.source: The EncodingCSV is parsing or writing in. This will be the Encoding you receive parsed data in and/or the Encoding data will be written in.
trans-unit.target: 该 Encoding CSV 是解析或以书面形式，这将是 Encoding ，你在收到的解析数据和/或 Encoding 数据将被写入。

trans-unit.source: The Enumerable mixin provides collection classes with several traversal and searching methods, and with the ability to sort. The class must provide a method each, which yields successive members of the collection. If Enumerable#max, min, or sort is used, the objects in the collection must also implement a meaningful <=> operator, as these methods rely on an ordering between members of the collection.
The ENV object interacts with the operating system's environment variables:
The Etc module provides a more reliable way to access information about the logged in user than environment variables such as +$USER+.
trans-unit.target: 与环境变量（例如+ $ USER +）相比， Etc 模块提供了一种更可靠的方式来访问有关已登录用户的信息。

trans-unit.source: The Etc module provides access to information typically stored in files in the /etc directory on Unix systems.
trans-unit.target: 的 Etc 模块提供访问信息通常被存储在在Unix系统/ etc目录文件。

trans-unit.source: The Exception object set by Kernel#raise.

The Fiber#resume method accepts an arbitrary number of parameters, if it is the first call to resume then they will be passed as block arguments. Otherwise they will be the return value of the call to Fiber.yield
The GC module provides an interface to Ruby's mark and sweep garbage collection mechanism.
trans-unit.target: 该 GC 模块提供Ruby的标记和清除垃圾回收机制的接口。

trans-unit.source: The GetoptLong class allows you to parse command line options similarly to the GNU getopt_long() C library call. Note, however, that GetoptLong is a pure Ruby implementation.
trans-unit.target: 该 GetoptLong 类允许您同样解析命令行选项GNU getopt_long（）C库调用。但是请注意， GetoptLong 是纯Ruby实现。

trans-unit.source: The Process::GID module contains a collection of module functions which can be used to portably get, set, and switch the current process's real, effective, and saved group IDs.
The GitProxy is responsible to interact with git repositories. All actions required by the Git source is encapsulated in this object.
trans-unit.target: 该 GitProxy 负责与git仓库进行交互。 Git 源所需的所有操作都封装在此对象中。

trans-unit.source: The GW provides a synchronized store for participants in the gateway to communicate.
trans-unit.target: 该 GW 提供了同步商店参与者网关进行通信。

trans-unit.source: The GzipFile object will be closed automatically after executing the block. If you want to keep the associated IO object open, you may call Zlib::GzipFile#finish method in the block.
trans-unit.target: 执行该块后， GzipFile 对象将自动关闭。如果要保持关联的 IO 对象处于打开状态，则可以在块中调用 Zlib::GzipFile#finish 方法。

trans-unit.source: The Fiddle::Handle is the manner to access the dynamic library
trans-unit.target: 该 Fiddle::Handle 是访问动态库的方式

trans-unit.source: The Net::HTTP methods in the following section do not persist connections. They are not recommended if you are performing many HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 下一节中的 Net::HTTP 方法不会持久连接。如果您执行许多 HTTP 请求，则不建议使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The HTTPHeader module defines methods for reading and writing HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 HTTPHeader 用于读取和写入模块定义了方法 HTTP 标头。

trans-unit.source: The InstructionSequence class represents a compiled sequence of instructions for the Ruby Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: 该 InstructionSequence 类表示为Ruby的虚拟机指令编译序列。

trans-unit.source: The InstructionSequence class represents a compiled sequence of instructions for the Virtual Machine used in MRI. Not all implementations of Ruby may implement this class, and for the implementations that implement it, the methods defined and behavior of the methods can change in any version.
The IO and File are both closed after the block completes if they haven't been already closed.
trans-unit.target: 该 IO 和 File ，如果他们没有被已经关闭块完成之后均关闭。

trans-unit.source: The IO class is the basis for all input and output in Ruby. An I/O stream may be duplexed (that is, bidirectional), and so may use more than one native operating system stream.
trans-unit.target: 该 IO 类是用于Ruby的所有输入和输出的基础。I / O流可以是双工的（即双向的），因此可以使用多个本机操作系统流。

trans-unit.source: The IO may be opened with different file modes (read-only, write-only) and encodings for proper conversion. See IO.new for these options. See Kernel#open for details of the various command formats described above.
trans-unit.target: 的 IO 可以用不同的文件模式进行适当的转换（只读，只写）和编码被打开。有关这些选项，请参见 IO.new 。有关上述各种命令格式的详细信息，请参见 Kernel#open 。

trans-unit.source: The IO stream is closed.
The IPAddr class defines many methods and operators, and some of those, such as &, |, include? and ==, accept a string, or a packed in_addr value instead of an IPAddr object.
trans-unit.target: 该 IPAddr 类定义了许多方法和运营商，以及其中的一些，如＆，|，包括哪些内容？和==，接受字符串或打包的 in_addr 值而不是 IPAddr 对象。

trans-unit.target: 所述 Kernel 模块由类包含 Object ，所以它的方法在每一个Ruby对象是可用的。

trans-unit.target: 所述 Kernel#open 方法可以创建一个 IO （或 File 为这些类型的参数）对象：

trans-unit.source: The Logger class provides a simple but sophisticated logging utility that you can use to output messages.
trans-unit.target: 该 Logger 类提供了一个简单而复杂的日志记录工具，你可以用它来输出消息。

trans-unit.source: The progname configured, or passed to the logger method.

trans-unit.source: The Severity of the log message.
trans-unit.target: 日志消息的 Severity 。

trans-unit.source: The Marshal format is used to serialize ruby objects. The format can store arbitrary objects through three user-defined extension mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: 该 Marshal 格式用来序列化Ruby对象。该格式可以通过三种用户定义的扩展机制存储任意对象。

trans-unit.source: The Math module contains module functions for basic trigonometric and transcendental functions. See class Float for a list of constants that define Ruby's floating point accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 该 Math 模块包含了基本三角函数和超越函数模块的功能。有关定义Ruby浮点精度的常量列表，请参见 Float 类。

trans-unit.source: The Object with the call method that is a completion for filename. This is sets by Readline.completion_proc= method.
trans-unit.target: 具有call方法的 Object ，该方法是文件名的完成。这是通过 Readline.completion_proc= 方法设置的。

trans-unit.source: The Object with the call method that is a completion for usernames. This is sets by Readline.completion_proc= method.

trans-unit.source: The eql? method returns true if obj and other refer to the same hash key. This is used by Hash to test members for equality. trans-unit.source: The String appended to the end of each row. This can be set to the special :auto setting, which requests that CSV automatically discover this from the data. Auto-discovery reads ahead in the data looking for the next "\r\n", "\n", or "\r" sequence. A sequence will be selected even if it occurs in a quoted field, assuming that you would have the same line endings there. If none of those sequences is found, data is ARGF, STDIN, STDOUT, or STDERR, or the stream is only available for output, the default $INPUT_RECORD_SEPARATOR ($/) is used. Obviously, discovery takes a little time. Set manually if speed is important. Also note that IO objects should be opened in binary mode on Windows if this feature will be used as the line-ending translation can cause problems with resetting the document position to where it was before the read ahead. This String will be transcoded into the data's Encoding before parsing.
trans-unit.target: 的 String 附加到每个行的末尾。可以将其设置为特殊的 :auto 设置，该设置要求 CSV 自动从数据中发现此设置。自动发现会先读取数据，以查找下一个 "\r\n" ， "\n" 或 "\r" 序列。即使序列出现在带引号的字段中，也将选择该序列，假设您在那里有相同的行尾。如果未找到这些序列，则 data 为 ARGF ， STDIN ， STDOUT 或 STDERR ，或者流仅可用于输出，默认 $INPUT_RECORD_SEPARATOR （ $/ ）。显然，发现需要一些时间。如果速度很重要，请手动 Set 。另请注意，如果将使用Windows功能的行尾转换功能，则在Windows上应以二进制模式打开 IO 对象，因为行尾转换会导致将文档位置重置为预读之前的位置的问题。解析之前，此 String 将被转码为数据的 Encoding 。

trans-unit.source: The String placed between each field. This String will be transcoded into the data's Encoding before parsing.

trans-unit.source: The :pgroup key in options specifies a process group. The Comparable mixin is used by classes whose objects may be ordered. The class must define the <=> operator, which compares the receiver against another object, returning -1, 0, or +1 depending on whether the receiver is less than, equal to, or greater than the other object. If the other object is not comparable then the <=> operator should return nil. Comparable uses <=> to implement the conventional comparison operators (<, <=, ==, >=, and >) and the method between?.
trans-unit.target: 在 Comparable 混入由类的对象，可以责令使用。该类必须定义 <=> 运算符，该运算符将接收方与另一个对象进行比较，并根据接收方是小于，等于还是大于另一个对象来返回-1、0或+1。如果其他对象不可比较，则 <=> 运算符应返回nil。 Comparable 使用 <=> 实现常规比较运算符（ < ， <= ， == ， >= 和 > ）以及 between? 的方法？。

trans-unit.source: The DidYouMean gem adds functionality to suggest possible method/class names upon errors such as NameError and NoMethodError. In Ruby 2.3 or later, it is automatically activated during startup.

The Enumerable mixin provides collection classes with several traversal and searching methods, and with the ability to sort. The class must provide a method each, which yields successive members of the collection. If Enumerable#max, #min, or #sort is used, the objects in the collection must also implement a meaningful <=> operator, as these methods rely on an ordering between members of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该 Enumerable 混入提供的集合类与几个遍历和搜索方法，以及排序的功能。该类必须提供一个 each 方法，该方法产生集合的连续成员。如果 Enumerable#max ， #min ，或 #sort 时，集合中的对象还必须实现一个有意义的 <=> 运营商，因为这些方法依赖于集合的成员之间的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The eql? method returns true if obj and other refer to the same hash key. This is used by Hash to test members for equality. Numeric types, for example, perform type conversion across ==, but not across eql?, so:

trans-unit.source: The local_to_utc method should convert a Time-like object from the timezone to UTC, and utc_to_local is the opposite. The result also should be a Time or Time-like object (not necessary to be the same class). The zone of the result is just ignored. Time-like argument to these methods is similar to a Time object in UTC without sub-second; it has attribute readers for the parts, e.g. year, month, and so on, and epoch time readers, to_i. The sub-second attributes are fixed as 0, and utc_offset, zone, isdst, and their aliases are same as a Time object in UTC. Also to_time, +, and - methods are defined.
trans-unit.target: 该 local_to_utc 方法应该转换时间状物体从时区到UTC，和 utc_to_local 是相反的。结果还应该是一个 Time 或类似Time的对象（不必是同一类）。结果 zone 将被忽略。这些方法的类似时间的参数类似于UTC中的 Time 对象，没有亚秒级。它具有部分的属性读取器，例如 year ， month 等，以及时期的读取器 to_i 。亚秒级属性固定为0，而 utc_offset ， zone ， isdst 及其别名与 Time 相同。UTC中的对象。还 to_time ， + 和 - 方法。

trans-unit.source: The options parameter can be anything CSV::new() understands. This method also understands an additional :encoding parameter that you can use to specify the Encoding of the data in the file to be read. You must provide this unless your data is in Encoding::default_external(). CSV will use this to determine how to parse the data. You may provide a second Encoding to have the data transcoded as it is read. For example, encoding: "UTF-32BE:UTF-8" would read UTF-32BE data from the file but transcode it to UTF-8 before CSV parses it.
trans-unit.target: 该 options 参数可以是任何东西 CSV::new() 了解。此方法还了解附加的 :encoding 参数，您可以使用该参数指定要读取的文件中数据的 Encoding 。除非您的数据位于 Encoding::default_external() 否则必须提供此选项。 CSV 将使用它来确定如何解析数据。您可以提供第二个 Encoding 以在读取数据时对数据进行转码。例如， encoding: "UTF-32BE:UTF-8" 将从文件中读取UTF-32BE数据，但在 CSV 解析之前将其转码为UTF-8 。

Beware that the exclude_end? property of a Range object is ignored, and the contents of a range are independent of the order of the range endpoints as per the protocol specification, so 1…5, 5..1 and 5…1 are all equivalent to 1..5.

trans-unit.source: The Common Gateway Interface (CGI) is a simple protocol for passing an HTTP request from a web server to a standalone program, and returning the output to the web browser. Basically, a CGI program is called with the parameters of the request passed in either in the environment (GET) or via $stdin (POST), and everything it prints to $stdout is returned to the client.

The Common Gateway Interface (CGI) is a simple protocol for passing an HTTP request from a web server to a standalone program, and returning the output to the web browser. Basically, a CGI program is called with the parameters of the request passed in either in the environment (GET) or via $stdin (POST), and everything it prints to $stdout is returned to the client.
trans-unit.target: 通用网关接口（CGI）是一种简单协议，用于将HTTP请求从Web服务器传递到独立程序，并将输出返回到Web浏览器。基本上，使用在环境（GET）或通过$ stdin（POST）中传递的请求参数调用 CGI 程序，并将其打印到$ stdout的所有内容返回给客户端。

trans-unit.source: The ID-to-object mapping component maps dRuby object ids to the objects they refer to, and vice versa. The implementation to use can be specified as part of a DRb::DRbServer's configuration. The default implementation is provided by DRb::DRbIdConv. It uses an object's ObjectSpace id as its dRuby id. This means that the dRuby reference to that object only remains meaningful for the lifetime of the object's process and the lifetime of the object within that process. A modified implementation is provided by DRb::TimerIdConv in the file drb/timeridconv.rb. This implementation retains a local reference to all objects exported over dRuby for a configurable period of time (defaulting to ten minutes), to prevent them being garbage-collected within this time. Another sample implementation is provided in sample/name.rb in the main dRuby distribution. This allows objects to specify their own id or “name”. A dRuby reference can be made persistent across processes by having each process register an object using the same dRuby name.
trans-unit.target: ID到对象的映射组件将dRuby对象ID映射到它们所引用的对象，反之亦然。可以在DRb :: DRbServer的配置中指定要使用的实现。默认实现由 DRb::DRbIdConv 。它使用对象的 ObjectSpace ID作为其dRuby ID。这意味着对该对象的dRuby引用仅在对象进程的生命周期和该进程内的对象生命周期内才有意义。 DRb::TimerIdConv 提供了修改的实现。在文件drb / timeridconv.rb中。此实现在一段可配置的时间段内（默认为十分钟）保留对通过dRuby导出的所有对象的本地引用，以防止在此时间内对其进行垃圾回收。dRuby主发行版中的sample / name.rb中提供了另一个示例实现。这允许对象指定自己的ID或“名称”。通过使每个进程使用相同的dRuby名称注册一个对象，可以使dRuby引用在各个进程之间具有持久性。

trans-unit.source: The Ruby VM defers Signal.trap callbacks from running until it is safe for its internal data structures, but it does not know when it is safe for data structures in YOUR code. Ruby implements deferred signal handling by registering short C functions with only async-signal-safe functions as signal handlers. These short C functions only do enough tell the VM to run callbacks registered via Signal.trap later in the main Ruby Thread.

The Ruby VM defers Signal.trap callbacks from running until it is safe for its internal data structures, but it does not know when it is safe for data structures in YOUR code. Ruby implements deferred signal handling by registering short C functions with only async-signal-safe functions as signal handlers. These short C functions only do enough tell the VM to run callbacks registered via Signal.trap later in the main VM loop.
trans-unit.target: Ruby VM推迟 Signal.trap 回调的运行，直到对其内部数据结构安全为止，但是它不知道何时对您的代码中的数据结构安全。Ruby通过仅向异步信号安全函数注册简短的C 函数作为信号处理程序来实现延迟信号处理。这些简短的C函数仅足以告诉VM 在主VM循环中稍后运行通过 Signal.trap 注册的回调。

trans-unit.source: The bang methods (! at the end of the method name) are called and executed just like any other method. However, by convention, a method with an exclamation point or bang is considered dangerous. In Ruby's core library the dangerous method implies that when a method ends with a bang (!), it indicates that unlike its non-bang equivalent, permanently modifies its receiver. Almost always, the Ruby core library will have a non-bang counterpart (method name which does NOT end with !) of every bang method (method name which does end with !) that does not modify the receiver. This convention is typically true for the Ruby core library but may or may not hold true for other Ruby libraries.
trans-unit.target: 像其他任何方法一样，调用并执行bang方法（方法名称末尾的 ! ）。但是，按照惯例，带有感叹号或爆炸声的方法被认为是危险的。在Ruby的核心库中，危险的方法暗示着，当方法以bang（ ! ）结尾时，它表示与非bang等价的方法不同，它会永久修改其接收者。几乎总是，Ruby的核心库将有一个非邦对应（这不是结束方法名 ! ），每一声方法（它与最终方法名的 ! 这不修改接收器）。该约定对于Ruby核心库通常是正确的，但对于其他Ruby库可能适用，也可能不适用。

trans-unit.source: The base class representing ASN.1 structures is ASN1Data. ASN1Data offers attributes to read and set the tag, the tag_class and finally the value of a particular ASN.1 item. Upon parsing, any tagged values (implicit or explicit) will be represented by ASN1Data instances because their “real type” can only be determined using out-of-band information from the ASN.1 type declaration. Since this information is normally known when encoding a type, all sub-classes of ASN1Data offer an additional attribute tagging that allows to encode a value implicitly (:IMPLICIT) or explicitly (:EXPLICIT).
trans-unit.target: 表示ASN.1结构的基类是 ASN1Data 。 ASN1Data 提供属性以读取和设置标签，tag_class以及最后一个特定ASN.1项目的值。解析后，任何标记的值（隐式或显式）都将由 ASN1Data 实例表示，因为它们的“实型”只能使用ASN.1类型声明中的带外信息来确定。由于在编码类型时通常知道此信息，因此 ASN1Data 的所有子类都提供了附加的属性标记，该属性标记允许隐式（ :IMPLICIT ）或显式（ :EXPLICIT ）。

trans-unit.source: The best way to use IO.select is invoking it after nonblocking methods such as read_nonblock, write_nonblock, etc. The methods raise an exception which is extended by IO::WaitReadable or IO::WaitWritable. The modules notify how the caller should wait with IO.select. If IO::WaitReadable is raised, the caller should wait for reading. If IO::WaitWritable is raised, the caller should wait for writing.

The best way to use IO.select is invoking it after nonblocking methods such as read_nonblock, write_nonblock, etc. The methods raise an exception which is extended by IO::WaitReadable or IO::WaitWritable. The modules notify how the caller should wait with IO.select. If IO::WaitReadable is raised, the caller should wait for reading. If IO::WaitWritable is raised, the caller should wait for writing.

The best way to use IO.select is invoking it after nonblocking methods such as read_nonblock, write_nonblock, etc. The methods raise an exception which is extended by IO::WaitReadable or IO::WaitWritable. The modules notify how the caller should wait with IO.select. If IO::WaitReadable is raised, the caller should wait for reading. If IO::WaitWritable is raised, the caller should wait for writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IO.select 的最佳方法是在非阻塞方法（例如 read_nonblock ， write_nonblock 等）之后调用它。这些方法引发一个由 IO::WaitReadable 或 IO::WaitWritable 扩展的异常。模块通过 IO.select 通知调用方应如何等待。如果引发 IO::WaitReadable ，则调用方应等待读取。如果引发 IO::WaitWritable ，则调用方应等待写入。

trans-unit.target: 比较运算符<，>，<=和> =被实现为{proper _，} {subset？，superset？}方法的简写形式。但是，有意地省略了<=>运算符，因为并非每对集合都是可比较的（例如{x，y}与{x，z}）。

trans-unit.source: The day count denotes the absolute position of a temporal dimension. The offset is relative adjustment, which determines decoded local time with the day count. The day of calendar reform denotes the start day of the new style. The old style of the West is the Julian calendar which was adopted by Caesar. The new style is the Gregorian calendar, which is the current civil calendar of many countries.
trans-unit.target: 日数表示一个时间维度的绝对位置。偏移量是相对调整,用日数确定解码的当地时间。历法改革日表示新式的起始日。西方的旧式是凯撒采用的朱利安历。新式是格里高利历,是许多国家现行的民历。

trans-unit.source: The day count is virtually the astronomical Julian day number. The offset in this class is usually zero, and cannot be specified directly.
trans-unit.target: 日数实际上就是天文上的朱利安日数。该类中的偏移量通常为零,不能直接指定。

trans-unit.target: 年月日应该是一个负数或正数(负数时为年末的相对日)。它不应该是零。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to mix the TSort module into an existing class (in this case, Hash). Here, we're treating each key in the hash as a node in the graph, and so we simply alias the required tsort_each_node method to Hash's each_key method. For each key in the hash, the associated value is an array of the node's child nodes. This choice in turn leads to our implementation of the required tsort_each_child method, which fetches the array of child nodes and then iterates over that array using the user-supplied block.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将 TSort 模块混入现有类（在本例中为 Hash ）。在这里，我们将哈希中的每个键都视为图中的一个节点，因此我们只需将所需的 tsort_each_node 方法别名为哈希的each_key方法即可。对于哈希中的每个键，关联的值是该节点的子节点的数组。这种选择反过来导致我们实现所需的 tsort_each_child 方法，该方法获取子节点的数组，然后使用用户提供的块在该数组上进行迭代。

trans-unit.source: The hash keys specifies a file descriptor in the child process started by spawn. :err, 2 and STDERR specifies the standard error stream (stderr).
The hash keys specifies a file descriptor in the child process started by spawn. :err, 2 and STDERR specifies the standard error stream (stderr).

trans-unit.source: The hash keys specifies a file descriptor in the child process started by spawn. :err, 2 and STDERR specifies the standard error stream (stderr).

The hash keys specify file descriptors in the child process. The hash values specifies file descriptors in the parent process. So the above specifies exchanging stdout and stderr. Internally, spawn uses an extra file descriptor to resolve such cyclic file descriptor mapping.
trans-unit.target: 哈希键在子进程中指定文件描述符。哈希值指定父进程中的文件描述符。因此，上面指定了交换标准输出和标准错误。在内部， spawn 使用额外的文件描述符来解析此类循环文件描述符映射。

trans-unit.source: The hash may include other options, where keys are symbols:
trans-unit.target: 哈希可以包括其他选项,其中键是符号。

trans-unit.source: The hash value for an object may not be identical across invocations or implementations of Ruby. If you need a stable identifier across Ruby invocations and implementations you will need to generate one with a custom method.

The hash value is used along with eql? by the Hash class to determine if two objects reference the same hash key. Any hash value that exceeds the capacity of an Integer will be truncated before being used.
The hash value returned is suitable for use as a certificate's filename in a CA path.

trans-unit.source: The hash values specifies a file descriptor in the parent process which invokes spawn. :out, 1 and STDOUT specifies the standard output stream (stdout).

trans-unit.source: The optional encoding keyword argument specifies the encoding of the new string. If not specified, the encoding of str is used (or ASCII-8BIT, if str is not specified).
trans-unit.target: 可选的encoding关键字参数指定新字符串的编码。如果未指定，的编码STR被使用（或ASCII-8BIT，如果STR未指定）。

trans-unit.source: The optional filename argument passed to Kernel#eval when the ERB code is run
trans-unit.target: 运行 ERB 代码时，传递给 Kernel#eval 的可选文件名参数

trans-unit.source: The optional limit argument specifies how many characters of each line to return. By default all characters are returned.
trans-unit.target: 可选的limit参数指定每行返回多少个字符。默认情况下，返回所有字符。

trans-unit.source: The optional lineno argument passed to Kernel#eval when the ERB code is run
trans-unit.target: 运行 ERB 代码时，将可选的lineno参数传递给 Kernel#eval

trans-unit.source: The optional start parameter determines the number of initial stack entries to omit from the top of the stack.
trans-unit.target: 可选的start参数确定要从堆栈顶部省略的初始堆栈条目数。

trans-unit.source: The optional argument opts is options represented by a hash. opts may have following options:
trans-unit.target: 可选参数opts是由哈希表示的选项。选择可能具有以下选项：

trans-unit.source: The optional keyword parameters loc and set specify where to insert the new attribute. Refer to the manpage of X509_NAME_add_entry(3) for details. loc defaults to -1 and set defaults to 0. This appends a single-valued RDN to the end.
trans-unit.target: 可选关键字参数loc和set指定在何处插入新属性。有关详细信息，请参见X509_NAME_add_entry（3）的联机帮助页。LOC默认为-1和组默认为0。此附加单值RDN到最后。

trans-unit.source: The optional last argument opts is options represented by a hash. opts may have following options:
trans-unit.target: 可选的最后一个参数opts是由哈希表示的选项。选择可能具有以下选项：

trans-unit.source: The optional parameter can be used to specify how to calculate the size in a lazy fashion (see Enumerator#size). It can either be a value or a callable object.
trans-unit.target: 可选参数可用于指定如何以惰性方式计算大小（请参阅 Enumerator#size ）。它可以是值或可调用对象。

trans-unit.source: The optional parameter s consists of either an integer; or an optional '+' or ' ', followed by an optional number, followed by an optional 'E' or 'F'.
trans-unit.target: 可选参数s包括一个整数;或者一个可选的'+'或'',后面是一个可选的数字,后面是可选的'E'或'F'。

trans-unit.source: The optional timeout parameter defines, in seconds, the total time to wait for the pattern. If the timeout expires or eof is found, nil is returned or yielded. However, the buffer in a timeout session is kept for the next expect call. The default timeout is 9999999 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 可选的timeout参数以秒为单位定义了等待模式的总时间。如果超时了或者发现了eof,则返回nil或者屈服。但是,超时会话中的缓冲区会被保留下来,供下一次期望调用时使用。默认的超时时间是999999秒。

trans-unit.source: The options below give you various choices, in more or less increasing complexity.
trans-unit.target: 下面的选项给你提供了各种选择,复杂程度或多或少地增加。

trans-unit.source: The options hash accepts the following keys:
trans-unit.target: 选项哈希接受以下键。

trans-unit.source: The options to pass to Process.spawn are constructed by merging opts, the last hash element of the array, and specifications for the pipes between each of the commands.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 Process.spawn 的选项是通过合并 opts ，数组的最后一个哈希元素和每个命令之间管道的规范来构造的。

trans-unit.source: The options to support are passed to new() as an array of arrays. Each sub-array contains any number of String option names which carry the same meaning, and one of the following flags:
trans-unit.target: 支持的选项作为数组数组传递给new（）。每个子数组都包含任意数量的具有相同含义的 String 选项名称，以及以下标志之一：

trans-unit.source: The options used when no overrides are given by calling code. They are:
trans-unit.target: 当调用代码没有给出覆盖时使用的选项。这些选项是:

trans-unit.source: The order in which environment variables are examined is OS-dependent. See About Ordering.
The order in which values are removed/returned is not guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 移除/返回值的顺序是不保证的。

trans-unit.source: The order of the names is OS-dependent. See About Ordering.
The order of the values is OS-dependent. See About Ordering.
The orders of each hashes are not compared.
trans-unit.target: 各个哈希值的顺序不做比较。

trans-unit.source: The ordinal date is a particular day of a calendar year identified by its ordinal number within the year.
trans-unit.target: 顺序日期是指一个日历年的某一天,以其在该年内的顺序号来确定。

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the hemisphere as 'lat' or 'lon'
trans-unit.target: 半球的方向为 "纬 "或 "长"。

trans-unit.source: The origin (zero) of the returned value varies. For example, system start up time, process start up time, the Epoch, etc.
trans-unit.target: 返回值的原点(0)不同。例如,系统启动时间、进程启动时间、纪元等。

trans-unit.source: The origin in CLOCK_REALTIME is defined as the Epoch (1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC). But some systems count leap seconds and others doesn't. So the result can be interpreted differently across systems. Time.now is recommended over CLOCK_REALTIME.
trans-unit.target: CLOCK_REALTIME 中的起点定义为纪元（1970-01-01 00:00:00 UTC）。但是有些系统计数leap秒，而另一些则没有。因此，结果在系统之间的解释可能有所不同。建议在 CLOCK_REALTIME Time.now 使用Time.now。

trans-unit.source: The original ndbm library is released in 4.3BSD. It is based on dbm library in Unix Version 7 but has different API to support multiple databases in a process.
trans-unit.target: 最初的ndbm库是在4.3BSD中发布的。它基于Unix版本7中的dbm库,但有不同的API来支持一个进程中的多个数据库。

trans-unit.source: The other way to use a case expression is like an if-elsif expression:
trans-unit.target: 使用 case 表达式的另一种方式类似于if-elsif表达式：

trans-unit.source: The output field separator for Kernel#print and Array#join. Non-nil $, will be deprecated.
The output field separator for the print and Array#join.
trans-unit.target: print和 Array#join 的输出字段分隔符。

trans-unit.source: The output length in octets. Must be <= 255 * HashLen, where HashLen is the length of the hash function output in octets.
trans-unit.target: 输出长度（以八位字节为单位）。必须为<= 255 * HashLen ，其中HashLen是以八位字节为单位的哈希函数输出的长度。

trans-unit.source: The output object.
trans-unit.target: 输出对象。

trans-unit.source: The output record separator for Kernel#print and IO#write. Default is nil.
The output record separator for the print and IO#write. Default is nil.
trans-unit.target: print和 IO#write 的输出记录分隔符。默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: The padding character is optional. This method accepts both correctly-padded and unpadded input. Note that it still rejects incorrectly-padded input.
trans-unit.target: 填充字符是可选的。本方法同时接受正确填充和未填充的输入。需要注意的是,它仍然拒绝接受错误填充的输入。

trans-unit.source: The parameter min specifies the minimum number of bytes that should be received when a read operation is performed. (default: 1)
trans-unit.target: 参数 min 指定执行读取操作时应接收的最小字节数。（默认值：1）

trans-unit.source: The parameter time specifies the timeout in seconds with a precision of 1/10 of a second. (default: 0)
trans-unit.target: 参数 time 以秒为单位指定超时时间，精度为1/10秒。（默认值：0）

trans-unit.source: The parameters env, cmd, and opts are passed to Process.spawn. A commandline string and a list of argument strings can be accepted as follows:
trans-unit.target: 参数env，cmd和opts传递给 Process.spawn 。可以接受命令行字符串和参数字符串列表，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The parent class for all constructed encodings. The value attribute of a Constructive is always an Array. Attributes are the same as for ASN1Data, with the addition of tagging.
trans-unit.target: 所有构造的编码的父类。 Constructive 的value属性始终是 Array 。其属性与 ASN1Data 相同，只是添加了标签。

trans-unit.source: The parent class for all primitive encodings. Attributes are the same as for ASN1Data, with the addition of tagging. Primitive values can never be encoded with indefinite length form, thus it is not possible to set the indefinite_length attribute for Primitive and its sub-classes.
trans-unit.target: 所有原始编码的父类。其属性与 ASN1Data 相同，只是添加了标签。 Primitive 值永远不能以不确定的长度形式进行编码，因此无法为 Primitive 及其子类设置indefinite_length属性。

trans-unit.source: The parent process should use Process.wait to collect the termination status of its child or use Process.detach to register disinterest in their status; otherwise, the operating system may accumulate zombie processes.

The parent process should use Process.wait to collect the termination status of its child or use Process.detach to register disinterest in their status; otherwise, the operating system may accumulate zombie processes.
trans-unit.target: 父进程应该使用 Process.wait 来收集其子进程的终止状态，或者使用 Process.detach 来注册对其状态不感兴趣的对象；否则，操作系统可能会累积僵尸进程。

trans-unit.source: The parentheses around the arguments are optional:
trans-unit.target: 参数周围的括号是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The passed-in no-argument block is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 传入的无参数块将被忽略。
